column2: Curations: The Dark Side of Humanity
column5:
This curation contains films dealing with the concept of evil and its many faces.

What is evil? Why do we have a wish for it? Why do we allow it? Is there a point in suffering?

The Dark Side of Humanity explores these questions by studying several award-winning films. All films have been proven to challenge how we think about the human kind.

Requirements:
- Award-winning films.
- Rely on hyper realism & have extremely scarce or null fantastical components.
- Have no rating restrictions.
- Have little to no positive nor uplifting components.

Films are ordered in ascending order based on how accurate (not necessarily how shocking or explicit) evil is portrayed (in my opinion).

column2: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
We Need to Talk About Kevin
The Killing of a Sacred Deer
